TopicTitle: topics sorted by date by default

Articles.Content: hi, is possible to visualize a topic with its answers "sorted by date" by default, so without to push the relative button, instead of "sorted by votes"?

36 minutes ago, antipro said:

hi, is possible to visualize a topic with its answers "sorted by date" by default, so without to push the relative button, instead of "sorted by votes"?

That is a topic we are currently investigating.   Under the new update, the "correct answer" is now highlighted  at the top of the thread for easy navigation.   The old system was sorted by Votes to keep the best answer up top.   Because the new system works without sorting by votes and still shows the best answer, we looked into setting "sort by date" as the forum default.    Sadly though, with this update, that is not an option right now, but inquiries are being made to get this done.
